en.ask_loan_amount: How much is your loan? Please use this format: 100000
en.invalid_number: You didn't enter a valid input type. Please try again!
en.no_zeros: Sorry, we can't have you enter 0 for the loan amount or loan duration in years. Please try again.
en.ask_apr: What is your annual percentage rate? Please use this format: 2.5 for 2.5% or 5 for 5%
en.ask_year: How long does your loan last in years (and months, if applicable)? Please use whole numbers and enter the amount of years first.
en.ask_months: How many additional months does your loan last? Please use whole numbers.
en.state_numbers: Okay, so we have a loan in the amount of ${loan_amount:,.2f} with an APR of {apr}% and it lasts for {loan_duration_years} year(s) and {loan_duration_months} month(s). Let me make my calculations.
en.no_interest: Oh, I see there is no interest - Nice! Let me adjust for that.
en.calc_error: There was an error in the calculation.
en.result: Okay, your monthly payment will be ${monthly_payment:,.2f} per month.
en.another_calculation: Would you like to calculate another monthly payment? Type Y for Yes and N for No:
en.preference_choice: You didn't select either of the correct options. Please try again!
en.end_of_program: Thanks for using my loan calculator! Have a nice day!
